comments.body: @mroeschke i'm confused by this; wouldn't we expect the tz in expected.index to be UTC, not `tz`

The naming of the test is a bit confusing, but this call here should _not_ be an inplace operation.

I'm checking that the original data `result` was not modified after calling `tz_localize/tz_convert` with `copy`

https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/issues/6326#issuecomment-34865955
ahh i see.  ill update #37498 appropriately

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +360,364 @@                        index=date_range('20131027', periods=5, freq='1H',
                                         tz=tz))
        getattr(result, method)('UTC', copy=copy)
        expected = Series(np.arange(0, 5),
                          index=date_range('20131027', periods=5, freq='1H',
